String.Source: There were several Khajiit camped outside the walls of Whiterun. Seems they've been traveling around the whole of Skyrim peddling their wares.
String.Dest: 有几个虎人在白漫城外面紮营了。他们贩卖货物的足迹遍布整个天际。

String.Source: I do everything awkward. I fight awkward, I run awkward, I even sleep awkward. So I apologize in advance for the snoring.
String.Dest: 啥事儿到了我手里都尴尬异常。我战斗的时候尴尬，跑路的时候尴尬，甚至连睡觉也会搞出岔子。按这个尿性来看我睡觉铁定得打呼噜，先提前说声对不住啦。

String.Source: Dwemer machines don't seem all that flexible, but they're as nimble as a cat. I wonder if there's something I can learn from the way they move.
String.Dest: 锻莫的机器不都那么灵活，但它们却像猫一样敏捷。我在想，自己能不能从它们的移动方式中学会什么事呢。

String.Source: I thought the Forsworn wielded dual weapons. The males, anyway.
String.Dest: 我想弃誓者都会用双持武器。好吧，至少男性弃誓者都会。

String.Source: Is that it? Hm...better check with the drunk. I'll keep looking around.
String.Dest: 是这样吗？嗯……最好再检查一下那个醉鬼。我会在附近接着找找看。

String.Source: Okay, but be careful. If you need my blade, I'll be at my sister's.
String.Dest: 好吧，但自己小心点儿。如果你需要我为你而战的话，我就在我姐姐那儿。

String.Source: And leave your back completely exposed? But why? Unless...Shor's bones, you're baiting her!
String.Dest: 让你的后背完全暴露？为什么？除非……舒尔的圣骨啊，你引诱她！

String.Source: May your road lead you to warm sands.
String.Dest: 愿你的前路是温暖的沙地。

String.Source: I don't think I need one. I thought I was dead for sure. But he missed my heart by a few inches.
String.Dest: 我不认为我需要一个。我以为自己必死无疑了。但他堪堪错过了我的心脏几英寸。

String.Source: I even had a plan too. I was going to charge in and catch them off guard. Take all the thinking out of it.
String.Dest: 我甚至都有了个计划。只要向守卫指控，等到守卫们抓捕他们，就可以让他们把想法全盘托出了。

String.Source: You'd be the first. Most people don't show me that kind of respect, so I...I'm thankful for your words.
String.Dest: 你是第一个对我如此温柔的人。大多数人都不会给予我如此的尊重，我……我很感谢你说出这番话。

String.Source: We should come back tomorrow and keep a close eye on him. I'll get up early and make sure the high ground is clear.
String.Dest: 我们明天应回去盯紧他， 我会起早一点然后确保高地被清理完毕的。

String.Source: You speak truly. Have you heard any interesting rumors of late?
String.Dest: 如你所说，你最近听过什么有趣的传言吗？

String.Source: It was a sound that slithered and swam through the air, rattling like a pair of bone snakes.
String.Dest: 一声响蜿蜒游过天边，像极了一条骨蛇。

String.Source: I'll teach you to talk to me that way!
String.Dest: 你居然敢这样跟我说话！

String.Source: I had a nightmare last night. Sahlene...marked in blood. It had the shape of a human hand.
String.Dest: 昨晚我做恶梦了。索伦她...浑身都是血。有个人手中拿着把刀子。

String.Source: I was mortified. Couldn't even breathe. I backed up, tripped, and fell on my bottom, clutching my blade like a doll. Sahlene didn't flinch.
String.Dest: 我窘迫不安。甚至连喘口气也不能。我后退，我摔倒，我掉到了人生的底部，紧紧地握着刀，如同僵硬的人偶。索伦没有畏缩。

String.Source: Only I was the one who lost my balance. I tripped on the stairs on the way up. Just another instance of me being awkward. Story of my life.
String.Dest: 我才是唯一没平衡感的人。我就是连上楼梯都能摔跤的。这只是我众多狼狈故事中的一个。我真实的生活写照。

String.Source: The Jarl had put up a bounty after word came of pilgrims dying near the Weynon Stones.
String.Dest: 领主在听到了那些谣言后曾悬赏求证， 据说朝圣者们会在维农宝石附近慢慢死去。

String.Source: Certainly! It's a fine tune and a good request!
String.Dest: 当然！那是首不错的曲子，非常好的选择！

String.Source: Damn that drunk! He'll probably pin this on us! We better chase after him!
String.Dest: 该死的酒！他很可能会用这个来压着我们！我们最好马上追上他！

String.Source: Although I do feel guilty for thinking that way.
String.Dest: 即使这么想让我很内疚。

String.Source: (Sigh) I know, but I just can't shake the feeling it's my fault. And that spirit we delivered, I doubt we've heard the last of him.
String.Dest: (叹气)我懂，但还是感觉是我的错。我们传播的精神，我怀疑是他仅剩的了。

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。
你回来了. 丹尼勒斯死了么?

String.Source: My love, we should stay here for the night. I didn't believe it at first, but the rooms here really are as cheap as the Windpeak Inn!
String.Dest: 亲爱的我们就在这过夜吧。我刚开始还不信，但这的放假真的和风岳旅店一样便宜!

String.Source: I apologized for the accident, and when he insisted it wasn't an accident, I accidentally punched him in the face.
String.Dest: 我为这次意外道歉，当他坚持说那不是个意外，我以外的打了他的脸。

String.Source: Aye, I noticed there were only three that died in that chamber, not counting Lorne. Which means whatever he is, he's still out there.
String.Dest: 赞成，我注意到室内只有三个尸体, 不算 洛恩. 这意味着不管他是什么，他依然逍遥法外.

String.Source: I think we know why. Supposedly it's the only thing that can kill Deneris.
String.Dest: 我想我知道原因。 恐怕这是唯一能杀死丹尼勒斯的东西了。

String.Source: I'm a bounty hunter, actually, when I'm not traveling with my friend here.
String.Dest: 如果不和朋友一起旅行，实际上我是一个赏金猎人。

String.Source: Good. I was beginning to think that drunk took us for fools. But we'd better check with him and make sure it's the right one.
String.Dest: 好的，我有点怀疑是不是酒精让我们变傻了。 我们最好还是仔细检查一下他，看他是不是真的。

String.Source: You've never been inside a cave before, have you. This is just the entrance. It opens up further down.
String.Dest: 你原来从来没进过洞穴把，这还只是洞口。后面会更深。

String.Source: So if you're headed to Winterhold, then I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 如果你要去冬堡，我和你一起。

String.Source: We gather here today, under Mara's loving gaze, to bear witness to the union of two souls in eternal companionship.
String.Dest: 我们齐聚於此，在玛拉慈爱的注视中，见证两个灵魂的结合。

String.Source: By Ysmir, you'll pay for that!
String.Dest: 伊斯米尔在上，你会为此付出代价的！

String.Source: We'll drive out the Empire from this land that we own. With our blood and our steel we will take back our home.
String.Dest: 驱逐帝国找回自我，用鲜血和盔甲重建家国。

String.Source: I don't have to take this from the likes of you.
String.Dest: 我不是非得从你这种人手里拿到这个。

String.Source: Is that the best you can do?
I hope they'll serve the roast venison with bittergreen sauce that we had at the last party.
String.Dest: 我希望他们能提供烤鹿肉和苦菜酱，就像我们上次宴会吃的那种。

String.Source: We drink to our youth, and to days come and gone. For the age of oppression is now nearly done.
String.Dest: 为了我们的青春，为了那些逝去的和将来的日子，我们乾杯。

String.Source: All hail to Ulfric! You are the High King! In your great honor we drink and we sing.
String.Dest: 向乌弗瑞克欢呼！您是至高王！我们为你的荣耀举杯欢庆。

String.Source: And while I realize there's something almost cruel about slaying a man's reputation, sometimes it is the only way.
String.Dest: 我意识到毁坏一个人的名誉几近冷酷, 但是有时那是唯一的办法.

String.Source: I might mistake you for Lorne if he weren't a sodding corpse. Now come on, I need you sober when we interrogate this one-eyed man.
String.Dest: 如果洛恩不是已经变成死尸我可能会把你跟他弄混. 现在, 我要你在审问这个独眼人的时候冷静下来.

String.Source: I know, but there was one child in particular, Jorn, who took things a step further. He used to climb on the rooftops and hurl stones at me.
String.Dest: 我知道，但是有个孩子很特殊，办事总是先人一步，名字叫乔恩。他总是爬到屋顶上朝我扔石头。

String.Source: I'll show you what a real Orc can do!
String.Dest: 让你见识一下兽人的强大！

String.Source: Alright. I'll do my best to keep this one alive. But if he does die, at least we can collect the bounty.
String.Dest: 好吧，我会尽我所能让这家伙活着。但是如果他还是死了，至少我们还能拿点赏金。

String.Source: But I know every time I look back on her life, it'll be with a little more fondness.
String.Dest: 但是每次我回想她的回去，我都会……有点……更想她。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Blast! What do you think? I don't trust this one, but he's our only lead.
String.Dest: 混蛋！!你怎么看？我可不信任这家伙，但是又没其他人选。

String.Source: They're only allowed on the city docks now. Most of them sleep together in one building, and they're as poor as wretches.
String.Dest: 他们现在只能住在城市的港口，大部分人都挤在一栋建筑里，像乞丐一样贫穷。

String.Source: I suppose you're right. But dead or alive, he was dangerous. And now, as you say, his body matches his heart. The man really was a piece of slime.
String.Dest: 我想你对了。但不管是死的是活的，他都很危险。正如你说的，他的身体和他的心脏融合了。他真的是一摊黏液。

String.Source: What can I do for you?
Drink for the thirsty, food for the hungry.
String.Dest: 渴了畅饮美酒，饿了大啖美食。

String.Source: How can I argue with that?
You...you better get back. If this is another misdirection, chasing this trail could end up getting Krillo killed.
String.Dest: 你……你最好回去。如果这是另外一个错误的指示，继续沿着这条小路走最后会让科瑞奥被杀掉的。

String.Source: I'm sorry, sir, I'm on duty.
String.Dest: 很抱歉，先生。这是我的职责。

String.Source: Don't worry about me in a fight. My swing may be a little unconventional, but it generates a lot of power.
String.Dest: 打起来的时候用不着担心我。我转的时候也许看起来不是那么正常，但是威力十足。

String.Source: (Sigh) I suppose it wasn't much of a lead to begin with. But maybe we'll find some clues at the inn.
String.Dest: （叹气）我想这不是什么好开端。不过我们也许能在这家小旅馆里找到什么线索。

String.Source: Everyone here is so glum...but I suppose it isn't exclusive to Windhelm. There's nothing in this world that somebody doesn't hate.
String.Dest: 这的人都太闷闷不乐了……不过我觉得不只是风舵城这样。这世界上就没有什么不被人所憎恶的东西。

String.Source: If I ever met the person, I don't know if I'd punch him or thank him. Beitild was kin, but she wasn't kind. Not even to me. Especially not to me.
String.Dest: 如果我见到那人, 真不知道应该揍他还是谢他. 贝缇尤德是我们亲戚, 但她并不和善。 甚至跟我也是……不，尤其是跟我。

String.Source: It's been a brutal winter. I can't remember the last time it was this cold, and for this long.
String.Dest: 这个冬天真要命，我不记得还有哪个冬天有这么冷，还持续了这么久。

String.Source: Maybe I got lucky, or maybe he's toying with us. But we have the Trinity Blade now, so he must be getting scared.
String.Dest: 也许我走了好运，也可能是他正玩我们呢。但是我们现在有了三体之刃，所以他现在肯定吓坏了。

String.Source: I want to search these ruins. If there's a chance she's still hiding here...I don't want to leave her behind again.
String.Dest: 我想搜索一下这片废墟。她依然有躲藏在这里的坑能行……我不想再抛弃她一次了。

String.Source: We ran down to the shoreline and combed the area.
String.Dest: 我们沿着海岸线把那个区域仔细地搜查了一遍。

String.Source: A spellsword would never carry a warhammer, or a shield.
String.Dest: 一个魔剑士永远不会用战锤或者是盾牌。

String.Source: We'd knock each other around with practice swords until our bodies were as lumpy as a toad. I won more than my share. Of lumps and gold.
String.Dest: 我们互相敲打来练习我们的剑术直到我们的身体笨重的像个蛤蟆一样。我赢得了比我分享的东西更多的回报,比如块煤和金子。

String.Source: Especially that Jolene...the things she says out in public would make a Draugr blush.
String.Dest: 尤其是那个乔伦娜……她在公共场合里说的那些个话尸鬼听了都脸红。
